name: Crazy 8s Gold
description: This card game is crazy fast and crazy fun. Play Crazy 8s against 3 computer opponents. Match number, letter, or color or play an 8 card to switch colors. For more crazy cards, use the Mau Mau rules and add Lose a Turn, Take a Card, and Switchback cards to the deck. This new Gold edition is just like the free version, but with no advertising!
